meanings.definition: A plant of the borage family with blue or purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The alkanets in the garden bloomed beautifully this spring.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of alkanets in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The alkanets in the field seemed to be having a colorful party.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas painted with alkanets.
meanings.sent5: The alkanets swayed gently in the breeze, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A red dye obtained from the roots of certain plants.
meanings.sent1: She used alkanets to dye the fabric a deep red hue.
meanings.sent2: The alkanets produced a rich red dye for the cloth.
meanings.sent3: The alkanets turned the water into a surprising shade of red.
meanings.sent4: The alkanets transformed the fabric into a scarlet masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The alkanets released their crimson essence, coloring everything around them.
